name: Slime Together (PredatoryShrimp)
description:
Combine slimes to solve puzzles!

Cyan Slime can swim

Magenta Slime can resist fire

Yellow Slime has a larger jump

Keyboard Controls:

WASD for movement

E for swap slime

Q for combine slimes

Space for jump

R for reset level

Works with controllers:

(XBOX)

D-pad for movement

Y for swap slime

X for combine slimes

A for jump

Start for reset level

I am sorry for not implementing a colorblind mode.
